home.subtitle: A beautiful suite of creative tools: text/data/media/map/regex/time utilities to boost your productivity.

color-picker.name: Color Picker
color-picker.desc: Professional color selection and conversion tool, supports multiple color formats, palette generation, accessibility checks and color analysis

file-hash-calculator.name: File Hash Calculator
file-hash-calculator.desc: Calculate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256 and other hash values for files, supports batch processing and integrity verification

json-diff-viewer.name: JSON Diff Viewer
json-diff-viewer.desc: Deep comparison of differences between two JSON objects, supports nested structures and detailed report export

http-requester.name: HTTP Requester
http-requester.desc: Powerful HTTP client, supports various request methods, custom headers, multiple data formats, and cURL import/export functionality

qr-code-generator.name: QR Code Generator
qr-code-generator.desc: Multi-functional QR code generation tool, supports text, URLs, WiFi, business cards and other content types, customizable styles and batch generation

url-parser.name: URL Parser
url-parser.desc: URL parsing and building tool, supports component decomposition, query parameter management, security analysis and variant generation

websocket-client.name: WebSocket Client
websocket-client.desc: Full-featured WebSocket test client, supports real-time communication and message logging

flashcard-generator.name: Flashcard Generator
flashcard-generator.desc: Smart flashcard learning tool, supports batch creation, category management, multiple learning modes and spaced repetition algorithms

phonetic-transcriber.name: Phonetic Transcriber
phonetic-transcriber.desc: Convert text to International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) or Pinyin, supports English and Chinese, provides pronunciation guidance and batch processing

coordinates-converter.name: Coordinates Converter
coordinates-converter.desc: Professional geographic coordinate format conversion tool, supports decimal degrees, degrees minutes seconds, degrees minutes and other format conversions

fraction-decimal-converter.name: Fraction Decimal Converter
fraction-decimal-converter.desc: Bidirectional conversion between fractions and decimals, supports repeating decimals and batch processing

matrix-calculator.name: Matrix Calculator
matrix-calculator.desc: Mathematical tool that supports matrix addition, subtraction, multiplication and determinant calculation

prime-tester-and-generator.name: Prime Tester and Generator
prime-tester-and-generator.desc: Prime number tester and generator tool

statistics-tool.name: Statistics Calculator
statistics-tool.desc: Comprehensive statistical analysis tool, calculates mean, variance, standard deviation, quantiles, confidence intervals and other statistics

diff-text.name: Text Diff
diff-text.desc: Powerful text difference comparison tool, supports multiple comparison modes (line/word/character/sentence) and display methods (side-by-side/unified/inline), provides detailed difference statistics and patch export functionality

glob-tester.name: Glob Pattern Tester
glob-tester.desc: Powerful Glob pattern testing tool, supports file path matching tests, pattern interpretation, regex conversion and common pattern library, suitable for build tools and file filtering scenarios

uuid-generator.name: UUID Generator
uuid-generator.desc: Generate various types of unique identifiers, supports UUID v1/v4, Nano ID and custom formats, includes validation and batch generation functionality

aes-encrypt-decrypt.name: AES Encrypt/Decrypt
aes-encrypt-decrypt.desc: AES-256-GCM encryption and decryption tool based on Web Crypto API, provides strong encryption and data integrity verification

password-strength-checker.name: Password Strength Checker
password-strength-checker.desc: Comprehensive password security analysis, provides strength scoring, crack time estimation and improvement suggestions

base64-decode.name: Base64 Decode
base64-decode.desc: Powerful Base64 decoding tool, supports standard and URL-safe formats, provides multiple output formats, data analysis, file preview and format validation functionality

csv-to-json.name: CSV ⇄ JSON Converter
csv-to-json.desc: Powerful CSV and JSON conversion tool, supports custom delimiters, automatic type detection, table preview and detailed data analysis, perfectly handles various formats of structured data

html-to-markdown.name: HTML to Markdown
html-to-markdown.desc: Powerful HTML to Markdown conversion tool, supports conversion of headings, lists, tables, code blocks and other elements, provides real-time preview and conversion analysis

json-minify.name: JSON Minify
json-minify.desc: Efficient JSON compression and optimization tool, supports multi-level compression, null value cleanup, size comparison analysis, designed to reduce file size and improve transmission efficiency

markdown-to-html.name: Markdown to HTML
markdown-to-html.desc: Convert Markdown format text to HTML code, supports real-time preview and multiple conversion options

text-case-converter.name: Text Case Converter
text-case-converter.desc: Comprehensive text case conversion tool, supports 10 conversion formats including camelCase, snake_case, kebab-case and other programming naming conventions, provides text analysis and batch processing functionality

url-decode.name: URL Decode
url-decode.desc: Smart URL decoding tool, supports multiple decoding types and multi-level decoding, provides URL analysis, parameter parsing and decoding step tracking functionality

url-encode.name: URL Encode
url-encode.desc: Comprehensive URL encoding tool, supports multiple encoding types (component, URI, form, custom), provides URL parsing, validation and parameter analysis functionality

yaml-to-json.name: YAML ⇄ JSON Converter
yaml-to-json.desc: Powerful YAML and JSON conversion tool, supports automatic format detection, syntax validation, formatting options and detailed data analysis, maintains complete data structure

cron-expression-validator.name: Cron Expression Validator
cron-expression-validator.desc: Validate and parse Cron expressions, preview execution times and frequency statistics
